client_id.description: The client id that will be used by Pubsub to make load balancing decisions

compression.description: Lock down the compression of the payload, leave empty for attribute based detection

encoding.description: Lock down the encoding of the payload, leave empty for attribute based detection

endpoint.description: Override of the Pubsub Endpoint, leave empty for the default endpoint

ignore_encoding_error.description: Ignore errors when the configured encoder fails to decoding a PubSub messages

insecure.description: Only has effect if Endpoint is not ""

project.description: Google Cloud Project ID where the Pubsub client will connect to

subscription.description: The fully qualified resource name of the Pubsub subscription

timeoutsettings.description: Timeout for all API calls. If not set, defaults to 12 seconds.

user_agent.description: User agent that will be used by the Pubsub client to connect to the service
